title: Arniston memoirs
snippet: 1832.] STATE OF THE TORY PARTY. 361 About the same time he had also seen the first threshing- machine upon the estate driven by steam power erected on his farm of Redheugh. But in 1838, tile-draining and the application  of steam as a motive power for agricultural purposes had made so little way as to be rather indications of the direction of progress than improvements which had come into general use.
